response.original_title: The Cat in the Hat: Safari So Good
response.overview: It's time for a safari, come and explore with the Cat and his friends on adventures galore. Reach for the treetops and swing through the trees, walk like giraffes and swing like monkeys! Join the Cat in the Hat on this brand new safari adventure! Help him find the missing stripes for his hat, swing with silly monkeys and discover how footprints are made!
response.title: The Cat in the Hat: Safari So Good

titles.title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That! Safari So Good
